articles.author: Franco Luna
articles.title: Pulse Asia: Marcos' lead grows, Robredo's lead shrinks in January pre-election surveys - Philstar.com
articles.description: Vice President Leni Robredo's 20% of respondents in the last Pulse Asia survey in December shrunk down to just 16% for the month of January.
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines — Ferdinand Marcos Jr., the son of the late ousted dictator, not only maintained but expanded his sizable lead over his rivals in January, while clear second-place Vice President … [+4284 chars]

articles.title: Explained: How Air India, AirAsia India pact for domestic passengers will work - The Indian Express
articles.description: Air India and AirAsia India have signed an agreement on interline considerations on irregular operations (IROPs). What is this, and how does it work? What changes for passengers?

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Singapore Airlines ends hiring freeze - Bangkok Post
articles.description: Singapore Airlines has resumed recruitment of cabin crew, ending a hiring freeze over the past two years as the Covid-19 pandemic decimated air travel around the world, Channel News Asia reported on Saturday.
